title: 2023 "National Take-Back Initiative"
description: On Saturday, October 28, 2023 from 10am-2pm at the Garfield Police Department, "National Take-Back Initiative" will be the day to get rid of your unused, unwanted, and expired medicine. The goal of the program is to allow the citizens of New Jersey to deliver their unwanted medications to law enforcement to dispose of them in a non hazardous manner, preventing them from falling into our children's hands or the illicit market. Batteries must be removed from e-cigarette devices!!! The Garfield Police Department is located at 411 Midland Ave., Garfield NJ. ALL PARTICIPANTS WILL REMAIN ANONYMOUS
